00052 typedef struct {
00053     float *vertexcos;
00054     short *flags;
00055 } MappedUserData;
00056 
00057 #define TAN_MAKE_VEC(a, b, c)   a[0] = b[0] + 0.2f * (b[0] - c[0]); a[1] = b[1] + 0.2f * (b[1] - c[1]); a[2] = b[2] + 0.2f * (b[2] - c[2])
00058 static void set_crazy_vertex_quat(float *quat, float *v1, float *v2, float *v3, float *def1, float *def2, float *def3)
00059 {
00060     float vecu[3], vecv[3];
00061     float q1[4], q2[4];
00062 
00063     TAN_MAKE_VEC(vecu, v1, v2);
00064     TAN_MAKE_VEC(vecv, v1, v3);
00065     tri_to_quat(q1, v1, vecu, vecv);
00066 
00067     TAN_MAKE_VEC(vecu, def1, def2);
00068     TAN_MAKE_VEC(vecv, def1, def3);
00069     tri_to_quat(q2, def1, vecu, vecv);
00070 
00071     sub_qt_qtqt(quat, q2, q1);
00072 }
00073 #undef TAN_MAKE_VEC
00074 
00075 static void make_vertexcos__mapFunc(void *userData, int index, const float co[3],
00076                                     const float UNUSED(no_f[3]), const short UNUSED(no_s[3]))
00077 {
00078     MappedUserData *mappedData = (MappedUserData *)userData;
00079     float *vec = mappedData->vertexcos;
00080 
00081     vec += 3 * index;
00082     if (!mappedData->flags[index]) {
00083         /* we need coord from prototype vertex, not it clones or images,
00084          * suppose they stored in the beginning of vertex array stored in DM */
00085         copy_v3_v3(vec, co);
00086         mappedData->flags[index] = 1;
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 static int modifiers_disable_subsurf_temporary(Object *ob)
00091 {
00092     ModifierData *md;
00093     int disabled = 0;
00094 
00095     for (md = ob->modifiers.first; md; md = md->next)
00096         if (md->type == eModifierType_Subsurf)
00097             if (md->mode & eModifierMode_OnCage) {
00098                 md->mode ^= eModifierMode_DisableTemporary;
00099                 disabled = 1;
00100             }
00101 
00102     return disabled;
00103 }
00104 
00105 /* disable subsurf temporal, get mapped cos, and enable it */
00106 float *crazyspace_get_mapped_editverts(Scene *scene, Object *obedit)
00107 {
00108     Mesh *me = obedit->data;
00109     DerivedMesh *dm;
00110     float *vertexcos;
00111     int nverts = me->edit_btmesh->bm->totvert;
00112     short *flags;
00113     MappedUserData userData;
00114 
00115     /* disable subsurf temporal, get mapped cos, and enable it */
00116     if (modifiers_disable_subsurf_temporary(obedit)) {
00117         /* need to make new derivemesh */
00118         makeDerivedMesh(scene, obedit, me->edit_btmesh, CD_MASK_BAREMESH, 0);
00119     }
00120 
00121     /* now get the cage */
00122     dm = editbmesh_get_derived_cage(scene, obedit, me->edit_btmesh, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
00123 
00124     vertexcos = MEM_callocN(3 * sizeof(float) * nverts, "vertexcos map");
00125     flags = MEM_callocN(sizeof(short) * nverts, "vertexcos flags");
00126 
00127     userData.vertexcos = vertexcos;
00128     userData.flags = flags;
00129     dm->foreachMappedVert(dm, make_vertexcos__mapFunc, &userData);
00130 
00131     dm->release(dm);
00132 
00133     /* set back the flag, no new cage needs to be built, transform does it */
00134     modifiers_disable_subsurf_temporary(obedit);
00135 
00136     MEM_freeN(flags);
00137 
00138     return vertexcos;
00139 }

00141 void crazyspace_set_quats_editmesh(BMEditMesh *em, float *origcos, float *mappedcos, float *quats)
00142 {
00143     BMVert *v;
00144     BMIter iter, liter;
00145     BMLoop *l;
00146     float *v1, *v2, *v3, *co1, *co2, *co3;
00147     int *vert_table = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * em->bm->totvert, "vert_table");
00148     int index = 0;
00149 
00150     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(em->bm, BM_VERT);
00151 
00152     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00153         if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT) || BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN))
00154             continue;
00155         
00156         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00157             BMLoop *l2 = BM_face_other_edge_loop(l->f, l->e, v);
00158             
00159             /* retrieve mapped coordinates */
00160             v1 = mappedcos + 3 * BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
00161             v2 = mappedcos + 3 * BM_elem_index_get(BM_edge_other_vert(l2->e, l->v));
00162             v3 = mappedcos + 3 * BM_elem_index_get(BM_edge_other_vert(l->e, l->v));
00163 
00164             co1 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * BM_elem_index_get(l->v) : l->v->co;
00165             co2 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * BM_elem_index_get(BM_edge_other_vert(l2->e, l->v)) : BM_edge_other_vert(l2->e, l->v)->co;
00166             co3 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * BM_elem_index_get(BM_edge_other_vert(l->e, l->v)) : BM_edge_other_vert(l->e, l->v)->co;
00167             
00168             set_crazy_vertex_quat(quats, v1, v2, v3, co1, co2, co3);
00169             quats += 4;
00170             
00171             vert_table[BM_elem_index_get(l->v)] = index + 1;
00172             
00173             index++;
00174             break; /*just do one corner*/
00175         }
00176     }
00177 
00178     index = 0;
00179     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00180         if (vert_table[index] != 0)
00181             BM_elem_index_set(v, vert_table[index] - 1);  /* set_dirty! */
00182         else
00183             BM_elem_index_set(v, -1);  /* set_dirty! */
00184         
00185         index++;
00186     }
00187     em->bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_VERT;
00188 
00189     MEM_freeN(vert_table);
00190 #if 0
00191     BMEditVert *eve, *prev;
00192     BMEditFace *efa;
00193     BMIter iter;
00194     float *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4, *co1, *co2, *co3, *co4;
00195     intptr_t index = 0;
00196 
00197     /* two abused locations in vertices */
00198     for (eve = em->verts.first; eve; eve = eve->next, index++) {
00199         eve->tmp.p = NULL;
00200         eve->prev = (EditVert *)index;
00201     }
00202 
00203     /* first store two sets of tangent vectors in vertices, we derive it just from the face-edges */
00204     for (efa = em->faces.first; efa; efa = efa->next) {
00205 
00206         /* retrieve mapped coordinates */
00207         v1 = mappedcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v1->prev);
00208         v2 = mappedcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v2->prev);
00209         v3 = mappedcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v3->prev);
00210 
00211         co1 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v1->prev) : efa->v1->co;
00212         co2 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v2->prev) : efa->v2->co;
00213         co3 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v3->prev) : efa->v3->co;
00214 
00215         if (efa->v2->tmp.p == NULL && efa->v2->f1) {
00216             set_crazy_vertex_quat(quats, co2, co3, co1, v2, v3, v1);
00217             efa->v2->tmp.p = (void *)quats;
00218             quats += 4;
00219         }
00220 
00221         if (efa->v4) {
00222             v4 = mappedcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v4->prev);
00223             co4 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * (intptr_t)(efa->v4->prev) : efa->v4->co;
00224 
00225             if (efa->v1->tmp.p == NULL && efa->v1->f1) {
00226                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(quats, co1, co2, co4, v1, v2, v4);
00227                 efa->v1->tmp.p = (void *)quats;
00228                 quats += 4;
00229             }
00230             if (efa->v3->tmp.p == NULL && efa->v3->f1) {
00231                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(quats, co3, co4, co2, v3, v4, v2);
00232                 efa->v3->tmp.p = (void *)quats;
00233                 quats += 4;
00234             }
00235             if (efa->v4->tmp.p == NULL && efa->v4->f1) {
00236                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(quats, co4, co1, co3, v4, v1, v3);
00237                 efa->v4->tmp.p = (void *)quats;
00238                 quats += 4;
00239             }
00240         }
00241         else {
00242             if (efa->v1->tmp.p == NULL && efa->v1->f1) {
00243                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(quats, co1, co2, co3, v1, v2, v3);
00244                 efa->v1->tmp.p = (void *)quats;
00245                 quats += 4;
00246             }
00247             if (efa->v3->tmp.p == NULL && efa->v3->f1) {
00248                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(quats, co3, co1, co2, v3, v1, v2);
00249                 efa->v3->tmp.p = (void *)quats;
00250                 quats += 4;
00251             }
00252         }
00253     }
00254 
00255     /* restore abused prev pointer */
00256     for (prev = NULL, eve = em->verts.first; eve; prev = eve, eve = eve->next)
00257         eve->prev = prev;
00258 #endif
00259 }

00263 void crazyspace_set_quats_mesh(Mesh *me, float *origcos, float *mappedcos, float *quats)
00264 {
00265     int i;
00266     MVert *mvert;
00267     MFace *mface;
00268     float *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4, *co1, *co2, *co3, *co4;
00269 
00270     mvert = me->mvert;
00271     for (i = 0; i < me->totvert; i++, mvert++)
00272         mvert->flag &= ~ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00273 
00274     /* first store two sets of tangent vectors in vertices, we derive it just from the face-edges */
00275     mvert = me->mvert;
00276     mface = me->mface;
00277     for (i = 0; i < me->totface; i++, mface++) {
00278 
00279         /* retrieve mapped coordinates */
00280         v1 = mappedcos + 3 * mface->v1;
00281         v2 = mappedcos + 3 * mface->v2;
00282         v3 = mappedcos + 3 * mface->v3;
00283 
00284         co1 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * mface->v1 : mvert[mface->v1].co;
00285         co2 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * mface->v2 : mvert[mface->v2].co;
00286         co3 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * mface->v3 : mvert[mface->v3].co;
00287 
00288         if ((mvert[mface->v2].flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0) {
00289             set_crazy_vertex_quat(&quats[mface->v2 * 4], co2, co3, co1, v2, v3, v1);
00290             mvert[mface->v2].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00291         }
00292 
00293         if (mface->v4) {
00294             v4 = mappedcos + 3 * mface->v4;
00295             co4 = (origcos) ? origcos + 3 * mface->v4 : mvert[mface->v4].co;
00296 
00297             if ((mvert[mface->v1].flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0) {
00298                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(&quats[mface->v1 * 4], co1, co2, co4, v1, v2, v4);
00299                 mvert[mface->v1].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00300             }
00301             if ((mvert[mface->v3].flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0) {
00302                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(&quats[mface->v3 * 4], co3, co4, co2, v3, v4, v2);
00303                 mvert[mface->v3].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00304             }
00305             if ((mvert[mface->v4].flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0) {
00306                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(&quats[mface->v4 * 4], co4, co1, co3, v4, v1, v3);
00307                 mvert[mface->v4].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00308             }
00309         }
00310         else {
00311             if ((mvert[mface->v1].flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0) {
00312                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(&quats[mface->v1 * 4], co1, co2, co3, v1, v2, v3);
00313                 mvert[mface->v1].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00314             }
00315             if ((mvert[mface->v3].flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0) {
00316                 set_crazy_vertex_quat(&quats[mface->v3 * 4], co3, co1, co2, v3, v1, v2);
00317                 mvert[mface->v3].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00318             }
00319         }
00320     }
00321 }
00322 
00323 int editbmesh_get_first_deform_matrices(Scene *scene, Object *ob, BMEditMesh *em, 
00324                                         float (**deformmats)[3][3], float (**deformcos)[3])
00325 {
00326     ModifierData *md;
00327     DerivedMesh *dm;
00328     int i, a, numleft = 0, numVerts = 0;
00329     int cageIndex = modifiers_getCageIndex(scene, ob, NULL, 1);
00330     float (*defmats)[3][3] = NULL, (*deformedVerts)[3] = NULL;
00331 
00332     modifiers_clearErrors(ob);
00333 
00334     dm = NULL;
00335     md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00336 
00337     /* compute the deformation matrices and coordinates for the first
00338      * modifiers with on cage editing that are enabled and support computing
00339      * deform matrices */
00340     for (i = 0; md && i <= cageIndex; i++, md = md->next) {
00341         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00342 
00343         if (!editbmesh_modifier_is_enabled(scene, md, dm))
00344             continue;
00345 
00346         if (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform && mti->deformMatricesEM) {
00347             if (!defmats) {
00348                 dm = getEditDerivedBMesh(em, ob, NULL);
00349                 deformedVerts = editbmesh_get_vertex_cos(em, &numVerts);
00350                 defmats = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*defmats) * numVerts, "defmats");
00351 
00352                 for (a = 0; a < numVerts; a++)
00353                     unit_m3(defmats[a]);
00354             }
00355 
00356             mti->deformMatricesEM(md, ob, em, dm, deformedVerts, defmats,
00357                                   numVerts);
00358         }
00359         else
00360             break;
00361     }
00362 
00363     for (; md && i <= cageIndex; md = md->next, i++)
00364         if (editbmesh_modifier_is_enabled(scene, md, dm) && modifier_isCorrectableDeformed(md))
00365             numleft++;
00366 
00367     if (dm)
00368         dm->release(dm);
00369 
00370     *deformmats = defmats;
00371     *deformcos = deformedVerts;
00372 
00373     return numleft;
00374 }
00375 
00376 int sculpt_get_first_deform_matrices(Scene *scene, Object *ob, float (**deformmats)[3][3], float (**deformcos)[3])
00377 {
00378     ModifierData *md;
00379     DerivedMesh *dm;
00380     int a, numVerts = 0;
00381     float (*defmats)[3][3] = NULL, (*deformedVerts)[3] = NULL;
00382     MultiresModifierData *mmd = get_multires_modifier(scene, ob, 0);
00383     int has_multires = mmd != NULL && mmd->sculptlvl > 0;
00384     int numleft = 0;
00385 
00386     if (has_multires) {
00387         *deformmats = NULL;
00388         *deformcos = NULL;
00389         return numleft;
00390     }
00391 
00392     dm = NULL;
00393     md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00394 
00395     for (; md; md = md->next) {
00396         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00397 
00398         if (!modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Realtime)) continue;
00399 
00400         if (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) {
00401             if (!defmats) {
00402                 Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
00403                 dm = mesh_create_derived(me, ob, NULL);
00404                 deformedVerts = mesh_getVertexCos(me, &numVerts);
00405                 defmats = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*defmats) * numVerts, "defmats");
00406 
00407                 for (a = 0; a < numVerts; a++)
00408                     unit_m3(defmats[a]);
00409             }
00410 
00411             if (mti->deformMatrices) mti->deformMatrices(md, ob, dm, deformedVerts, defmats, numVerts);
00412             else break;
00413         }
00414     }
00415 
00416     for (; md; md = md->next) {
00417         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00418 
00419         if (!modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Realtime)) continue;
00420 
00421         if (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform)
00422             numleft++;
00423     }
00424 
00425     if (dm)
00426         dm->release(dm);
00427 
00428     *deformmats = defmats;
00429     *deformcos = deformedVerts;
00430 
00431     return numleft;
00432 }
00433 
00434 void crazyspace_build_sculpt(Scene *scene, Object *ob, float (**deformmats)[3][3], float (**deformcos)[3])
00435 {
00436     int totleft = sculpt_get_first_deform_matrices(scene, ob, deformmats, deformcos);
00437 
00438     if (totleft) {
00439         /* there are deformation modifier which doesn't support deformation matrices
00440          * calculation. Need additional crazyspace correction */
00441 
00442         float (*deformedVerts)[3] = *deformcos;
00443         float (*origVerts)[3] = MEM_dupallocN(deformedVerts);
00444         float *quats = NULL;
00445         int i, deformed = 0;
00446         ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00447         Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
00448 
00449         for (; md; md = md->next) {
00450             ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00451 
00452             if (!modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Realtime)) continue;
00453 
00454             if (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) {
00455                 /* skip leading modifiers which have been already
00456                  * handled in sculpt_get_first_deform_matrices */
00457                 if (mti->deformMatrices && !deformed)
00458                     continue;
00459 
00460                 mti->deformVerts(md, ob, NULL, deformedVerts, me->totvert, 0, 0);
00461                 deformed = 1;
00462             }
00463         }
00464 
00465         quats = MEM_mallocN(me->totvert * sizeof(float) * 4, "crazy quats");
00466 
00467         crazyspace_set_quats_mesh(me, (float *)origVerts, (float *)deformedVerts, quats);
00468 
00469         for (i = 0; i < me->totvert; i++) {
00470             float qmat[3][3], tmat[3][3];
00471 
00472             quat_to_mat3(qmat, &quats[i * 4]);
00473             mul_m3_m3m3(tmat, qmat, (*deformmats)[i]);
00474             copy_m3_m3((*deformmats)[i], tmat);
00475         }
00476 
00477         MEM_freeN(origVerts);
00478         MEM_freeN(quats);
00479     }
00480 
00481     if (!*deformmats) {
00482         int a, numVerts;
00483         Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
00484 
00485         *deformcos = mesh_getVertexCos(me, &numVerts);
00486         *deformmats = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*(*deformmats)) * numVerts, "defmats");
00487 
00488         for (a = 0; a < numVerts; a++)
00489             unit_m3((*deformmats)[a]);
00490     }
00491 }
